msbt.message: Remember how we had, you know, planned to hang out?Were you out somewhere?I went to your house, but you weren't there.I missed you, !
I know I promised I'd come over, . But something's come up and I can't make it.I'm SO sorry!<10_4 /> I'll try and find some time to hang out soon, 'K?
, I've been feeling like a major loser. I'm sorry I totes ghosted on you the other dayIf you still want to, I'd be happy if you'd invite me again sometime.
